tool_description: Validates the identity of certificate requestors through various verification methods including document verification, organizational validation, and extended validation processes.

subject_dn.description: Distinguished name of the certificate subject to validate

validation_type.description: Type of validation: DV (domain), OV (organization), or EV (extended)

organization_name.description: Legal name of the organization (required for OV and EV)

business_registration_number.description: Official business registration number (required for EV)

error_messages: Incomplete organization information: OV and EV validation require organization_name and country_code.
Missing business registration: EV validation requires valid business_registration_number.
Invalid email format: contact_email must be a valid email address format.
Document verification failed: Provided verification documents could not be validated.
Organization not found: Could not verify organization existence in official registries.
Contact verification failed: Unable to confirm contact information through specified channels.
usage: Specify subject_dn, validation_type, and contact_email at minimum. For OV/EV validation, provide organization details and supporting documents. Tool will perform appropriate validation checks based on the validation type.

validation_status.description: Status of validation: PASSED, FAILED, or PENDING

verified_attributes.description: List of successfully verified subject attributes

validation_reference.description: Unique reference ID for this validation
